pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, April 1, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, April 1, 2016:

Washington, D.C., United States of America

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of the Republic of India.

Walter E. Washington Convention Center

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the opening plenary session of the Nuclear Security Summit, “National Actions to Enhance Nuclear Security”.

Plenary Meeting Room, Hall D, 2nd Floor
Walter E. Washington Convention Center

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will take part in the Official Group Photo.

Family Photo Room, Hall D, 2nd Floor
Walter E. Washington Convention Center

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Leaders' Working Luncheon given by the President of the United States of America, “International and Institutional Actions to Strengthen Nuclear Security”.

Plenary Meeting Room, Hall D, 2nd Floor
Walter E. Washington Convention Center

Notes for media:

  • Official photographers only


3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Final Plenary Session, “Scenario-based Policy Discussion and Closing Remarks”.

Plenary Meeting Room, Hall D, 2nd Floor
Walter E. Washington Convention Center

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

Walter E. Washington Convention Center

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


6:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Briefing Room 145-A, Street Level
Walter E. Washington Convention Center

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations: Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca 613-957-5555
